Short title: Section 1080 of D.C. Law 18-111 provided that subtitle I of title I of the act may be cited as the "Legislative Branch Budget Submission Act of 2009".

DC CODE § 47-318.01b

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: At least 20 days prior to the Mayor's submission of the annual budget to the Council, the Chairman of the Council shall transmit to the Mayor an estimate in detail of the amount of money required for the:
Office of the District of Columbia Auditor; and
Office of the Advisory Neighborhood Commissions for the ensuing fiscal year.

The Mayor shall transmit the same estimate required by subsection (a) of this section in his annual estimate of appropriations for the District of Columbia, with such recommendations as he may consider proper.
